title: microwave basmati rice
ingredients: 2/3 Cup basmati rice, well rinsed and drained in a colander
(optional) 1-3 tsp butter, ghee or coconut oil
instructions: Combine rice, water, and optional items in a microwave-safe bowl.
Cook on power 2/10 (for a 1200W microwave) for 23 minutes.
Let rest covered for 5 minutes, then fluff and serve.
notes: Can scale up to 2/3 Cup rice and 1 Cup water and cook on same power for 24-26 minutes.
